alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 17 at 3:35PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...Widespread heavy rain expected over Kauai Wednesday and Wednesday night... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall will be possible. * WHERE...Kauai and Niihau. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Bands of heavy rain in advance of an approaching front will increase the threat for flash flooding across Kauai beginning early Wednesday.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. A Flood Watch means that conditions are favorable for flash flooding. Flash Flooding is LIFE THREATENING. Do not cross fast flowing water in your vehicle or on foot.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau
